channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [CAMEL-9522] Groovy does not work with spring boot
item.description:
Trying to run a groovy scirpt in camel-spring-boot fails with NPE. To reacreate modify the examples-spring-boot route to this:

public void configure()

{ from("timer://trigger").setProperty("groovyProp").groovy("return 'hi'") .transform().simple("ref:myBean"). to("log:out", "mock:test"); }

and add dependency to pom:

<dependency>
<groupId>org.apache.camel</groupId>
<artifactId>camel-script</artifactId>
</dependency>

Startup fails with NPE.

StackTrace:

org.apache.camel.spring.boot.CamelSpringBootInitializationException: org.apache.camel.FailedToCreateRouteException: Failed to create route route1 at: >>> SetProperty[groovyProp, groovy

Unknown macro: {return 'hi'}

] <<< in route: Route(route1)[[From[timer://trigger]] -> [SetProperty[groovy... because of null

item.summary: Groovy does not work with spring boot

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: You need to add camel-groovy as dependency
Thank you, sorry for creating the issue. I should have done more research, I didn't see it under "Dependencies" section in the groovy page.
No problem I am improving the code so you dont get a NPE but a better exception
